mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(s.deal_amount, s.deposit) AS deal_amount, e.build_year FROM all_real_estate e JOIN all_real_estate_sales s ON e.id = s.estate_id WHERE e.latitude BETWEEN #{lat} - 0.000001 AND #{lat} + 0.000001 AND e.longitude BETWEEN #{lng} - 0.000001 AND #{lng} + 0.000001 ORDER BY s.deal_year DESC, s.deal_month DESC, s.deal_day DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT br.res_violation_status, bruf.res_use_type FROM building_registry br LEFT JOIN building_registry_use_for bruf ON br.id = bruf.register_id WHERE br.latitude = #{lat} AND br.longitude = #{lng} ;
